players.name: Alice
memory: You: "This is terrible! Bob was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who among us is the mafioso. Does anyone have any information or observations to share?"
Charlie: "Based on my investigation last night, I believe Alice is the mafioso. It's crucial we work together to eliminate her before she eliminates more town members."
Charlie: "I strongly suspect Alice is the mafioso based on my investigation last night. It's important we all work together to ensure her elimination before she causes further harm to our town."
